statements: SELECT * FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT id, file_name FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE resolution = '1920x1080';
SELECT file_name, creation_date FROM digital_art_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, dimensions, resolution, creation_date FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE file_name LIKE '%abstract%';
SELECT * FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE dimensions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT file_name, resolution FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE resolution LIKE 'HD%' ORDER BY resolution;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE creation_date >= '2020-01-01' AND creation_date <= '2020-12-31' ORDER BY file_name DESC;
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions, resolution, creation_date FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE file_name ILIKE '%art%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM artwork_metadata;
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions FROM artwork_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artist_info WHERE style='Impressionism';
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions, resolution FROM artwork_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_year FROM artist_info ORDER BY birth_year ASC;
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions, resolution, creation_date FROM artwork_metadata WHERE file_name LIKE 'Art%' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, nationality, style, birth_year FROM artist_info WHERE nationality = 'Italian' AND style = 'Baroque';
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions, resolution, creation_date FROM artwork_metadata WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31';
SELECT artist_name, style, birth_year FROM artist_info ORDER BY birth_year ASC, style DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artist_info WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Leonardo%' ORDER BY nationality ASC;
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions, resolution, creation_date FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT file_name, dimensions, creation_date, resolution, id FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT resolution, id, creation_date, file_name, dimensions FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT id, creation_date, file_name FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT dimensions, file_name, creation_date, resolution FROM digital_art_metadata;
SELECT id, creation_date, file_name FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT * FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, dimensions FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE file_name LIKE '%nature%' ORDER BY dimensions ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, file_name, resolution FROM digital_art_metadata WHERE dimensions IN ('1000x1000', '1920x1080') ORDER BY resolution DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_files;
SELECT file_name, dimensions, resolution FROM digital_art_files WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, nationality FROM artists;
SELECT gallery_name, location, num_artworks FROM galleries WHERE num_artworks > 10 ORDER BY num_artworks DESC;
SELECT collection_name, curator, creation_date FROM art_collections WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM digital_art_files WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY file_name DESC
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_date FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French' AND style = 'Impressionism' ORDER BY birth_date ASC
SELECT gallery_name, location, num_artworks FROM galleries WHERE num_artworks > 20 ORDER BY num_artworks DESC
SELECT collection_name, curator, num_artworks FROM art_collections WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' AND curator = 'John Doe' ORDER BY collection_name ASC
SELECT file_name, dimensions, resolution FROM digital_art_files WHERE dimensions IS NOT NULL AND resolution IS NOT NULL ORDER BY file_name ASC
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM artists WHERE nationality='French';
SELECT file_name, dimensions, creation_date FROM digital_art_files ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_gallery WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY gallery_name;
SELECT artist_name, collection_name, style_name FROM artists JOIN art_collections ON artists.artist_id = art_collections.collection_id JOIN art_styles ON artists.artist_id = art_styles.style_id;
SELECT * FROM digital_art_files
SELECT id, file_name, dimensions FROM digital_art_files WHERE resolution = 'High'
SELECT artist_name, nationality, style_name FROM artists, art_styles WHERE artists.artist_id = art_styles.style_id
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM art_gallery ORDER BY gallery_name DESC
SELECT collection_name, COUNT(id) AS total_files FROM art_collections LEFT JOIN digital_art_files ON art_collections.collection_id = digital_art_files.id GROUP BY collection_name
